PATIENT_ID: TEST_BLOOD_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-23 06:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-23 06:10:00
Category I activation for 42-year-old male, multiple stab wounds to torso.
Hemorrhagic shock. BP 72/44, HR 140, RR 30. Tachycardic and hypotensive.
Massive Transfusion Protocol activated. Blood bank notified.
Emergency-release PRBCs administered immediately.
Type and cross sent. Crossmatch pending.
2 units packed red blood cells transfused.
1 unit FFP administered.

[LAB] 2026-01-23 06:20:00
Type and cross collected and sent to blood bank.
Fibrinogen: 180 mg/dL.
Ionized calcium: 1.10 mmol/L.
PT: 14.2 sec, INR: 1.2, PTT: 32 sec.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-23 06:45:00
Continued hemorrhage. MTP ongoing.
4 additional units PRBCs and 2 FFP given per institutional algorithm.
TXA administered within 2 hours of bleeding onset.
Calcium supplementation given with ongoing transfusion.
PRBCs and plasma warmed using approved blood warmer device.
Bleeding controlled. Hemodynamics improving. BP now 98/64.
